mdRecord.dcterms:description: "The Prentiss Club was chartered in 1903 as a private men’s club and named after Sergeant S. Prentiss, a Natchez lawyer whose portraits adorns the façade." --http://misspreservation.com/101-mississippi-places-to-see-before-you-die/prentiss-club-natchez/ [work]
